catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: خمسۀ نظامى
author: Niẓāmī
description: 1 copy of Khamsah-ʼi Niẓāmī by Niẓāmī Ganjavī, 1140 or 41-1202 or 3.
record_origin: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Persian manuscripts with additional enhancements by the Fihrist project team.
